thread.title: San Jose, CA - Overturned Vehicle Crash With Injuries on CA-85 North Near Almaden Expy
thread.title_full: San Jose, CA - Overturned Vehicle Crash With Injuries on CA-85 North Near Almaden Expy

author: Harvey Barbee
title: San Jose, CA - Overturned Vehicle Crash With Injuries on CA-85 North Near Almaden Expy
text:
San Jose, CA (February 20, 2025) â€“ A traffic collision involving an overturned vehicle on northbound CA-85 near Almaden Expressway resulted in injuries and traffic delays Thursday morning.
The California Highway Patrol (CHP) reported the crash at approximately 7:46 AM. Emergency responders arrived at the scene to assist the injured, while the right lane was blocked due to the wreckage. Authorities have not yet confirmed the number of vehicles involved or the severity of injuries.
Traffic in the area was significantly impacted, and drivers were advised to expect delays or seek alternate routes. CHP is actively investigating the cause of the crash. Anyone with additional information is encouraged to contact law enforcement.
Overturned Vehicle Crashes in California Rollover accidents are among the most dangerous types of crashes, often resulting in severe injuries due to the force of impact. These incidents frequently occur due to speeding, sharp turns, or collisions with other vehicles. High-traffic highways like CA-85 are particularly susceptible to such accidents.
Each year, thousands of drivers in California experience rollover crashes, leading to medical expenses, vehicle damage, and long recovery periods. Understanding available support and seeking appropriate resources can be essential for those affected.
If you or a loved one has been injured in a rollover crash, professional guidance can help navigate the legal and financial challenges that often follow.
Local Accident Reports is committed to keeping you informed and connecting you with the support you need after a serious accident. If you or someone you love has been hurt in a crash, reach out to us for assistance in understanding your next steps.
